publicwhip.spmotion: *S3M-1190 Jim Tolson: Fife Jazz Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the first Fife Jazz Festival on 8 to 10 February 2008; notes that the promoters hope to make the festival an annual fixture; acknowledges the positive effect that this festival will have on cultural wellbeing of people across Fife and the visitors to the area, and congratulates Fife resident, Tommy Sampson, on leading his Big Band on the occasion of his 90th birthday on 28 April in the Queen’s Hall, Edinburgh.
S3M-1190 Fife Jazz Festival (lodged on 21 January 2008) Bashir Ahmad*, Nanette Milne*, Elizabeth Smith*, Iain Smith*, Bill Kidd*, Hugh O’Donnell*, Elaine Smith*, Patricia Ferguson*, Jamie Stone*
S3M-1190 Fife Jazz Festival (lodged on 21 January 2008) Kenneth Gibson*, Trish Godman*, Dr Richard Simpson*

S3M-1190 Jim Tolson: Fife Jazz Festival—That the Parliament welcomes the first Fife Jazz Festival on 8 to 10 February 2008; notes that the promoters hope to make the festival an annual fixture; acknowledges the positive effect that this festival will have on cultural wellbeing of people across Fife and the visitors to the area, and congratulates Fife resident, Tommy Sampson, on leading his Big Band on the occasion of his 90th birthday on 28 April in the Queen’s Hall, Edinburgh. Supported by: Bashir Ahmad, Nanette Milne, Elizabeth Smith, Iain Smith, Bill Kidd, Hugh O’Donnell, Elaine Smith, Patricia Ferguson, Jamie Stone, Kenneth Gibson, Trish Godman, Dr Richard Simpson
S3M-1190 Fife Jazz Festival (lodged on 21 January 2008) Stuart McMillan*
S3M-1190 Fife Jazz Festival (lodged on 21 January 2008) Gil Paterson*
